result.title: Let's start again
result.content:
Group has been reactivated.

The formula is little bit different â€” we won't organize contest as often as we did, let's focus on hard problems, interesting tutorials/websites, common analyzing codes and finding solutions.

If you found interesting problem/solution/tutorial on Internet, post a topic about it. If you can't solve a problem, go ahead and write about it.

I want this group to become a database of interesting topics and "starting point" for learning new things.

If you have any suggestion, please leave a comment.
